sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import "./index.scss" function ModalContainer() { const [dataModal, setData] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { getfetch(); }, []); async function getfetch() { const res = await fetch( "https://6573ac96f941bda3f2af125e.mockapi.io/juan-store/api/v1/products" ); const data = await res.json(); setData(data); } return (

{data.name}

{data.price}

{data.description?.text}

Size
Color
-
5
+
) } export default ModalContainer
